channel.title: 637 npc help
channel.description: I was wondering how do you program npc's with multiple atks. I know its like TormentedDemon.java and TormentedDemonAction.java but i want to know the trick to making other npc's with just MULTIPLE ATKS. Like Corp or something. This is on Torvapkz 637. :confused:

item.title: 637 npc help
item.dc:creator: @deathdud89 deathdud89
item.description:

I was wondering how do you program npc’s with multiple atks. I know its like TormentedDemon.java and TormentedDemonAction.java but i want to know the trick to making other npc’s with just MULTIPLE ATKS. Like Corp or something. This is on Torvapkz 637.
